title: PGPD Investigates Fatal Collision in Clinton
body:
The
Collision Analysis and Reconstruction Unit is investigating a fatal crash in Clinton.
The victim is 18-year-old Daniel Navarro-Caravantes of Brook Jane Drive in
Clinton. On
April 15, at approximately 10:50 pm, patrol officers responded to
the 8400 block of Temple Hill Road for a collision involving a single car. The preliminary
investigation reveals the car was heading southbound on Temple Hill Road when
for reasons which remain under investigation, it left the roadway and struck a
pole. The victim was pronounced dead on the scene. There were no passengers in
the car.    Anyone with information is
asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s Collision Analysis
and Reconstruction Unit at 301-731-4422. Callers wishing to remain
anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477);
online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com or the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search
“P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app to your mobile
device).

Prince George's County Police


at
